com.marand.thinkehr.jsonlib

Interface CompositionConverter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositionConverterImpl

    public interface CompositionConverter
    A converter that is capable of translating between a map of web template paths (usually generated from FLAT JSON composition format) into org.openehr.jaxb.rm.Composition objects and vice-versa.

    An example of conversion from Map to Composition:

     // Convert from map to composition
 // The  map of web template - value pairs
 Map<String, Object> values = new LinkedHashMap<>();
 // Required context information
 values.put("ctx/language", "en");
 values.put("ctx/territory", "UK");
 values.put("ctx/composer_name", "John Gibson");
 // The medical data
 values.put("vitals/vitals/body_temperature:0/any_event:0/temperature|magnitude", 37.9d);
 values.put("vitals/vitals/body_temperature:0/any_event:0/temperature|unit", "Â°C");

 // Conversion
 CompositionConverter converter = new CompositionConverterImpl();
 final Composition composition;
 // The .opt operational template is located in the classpath
 try (InputStream operationalTemplate = ConversionExample.class.getResourceAsStream("/Demo Vitals.opt")) {
 composition = converter.toComposition(operationalTemplate, values);
 }

 // ... Do something with the composition

    An example of conversion from Composition to Map:

     // Convert from composition to map
 Map<String, Object> valueMap;
 try (InputStream operationalTemplate = ConversionExample.class.getResourceAsStream("/Demo Vitals.opt")) {
 valueMap = converter.fromComposition(operationalTemplate, composition);
 }

 // ... Do something with the map, such as convert it to JSON

    This two methods have counterparts that take an org.openehr.jaxb.am.Template object instead of an InputStream. To produce a Template object from an .opt, use the JAXB library with the following Unmarshaller: 

     JAXBContext context = JAXBContext.newInstance("org.openehr.jaxb.rm:org.openehr.jaxb.am");
 Unmarshaller unmarshaller = context.createUnmarshaller();
 unmarshaller.setSchema(null); // disable schema validation
    Since:
    09.02.2016

      Map<String,Object> fromComposition(InputStream operationalTemplate, Composition composition)

    • Method Detail

      • toComposition

        Composition toComposition(InputStream operationalTemplate,
                          Map<String,Object> pathValueMap)
        Converts the specified map of web template path - value pairs into a Composition object. The following context parameters are required and MUST be supplied in the pathValueMap:
        • ctx/language - The language to use to resolve the terminology strings against.
        • ctx/territory - The territory (country).
        • ctx/composer_name - The name of the composer of the composition.

        Additional context parameters are also supported.

        Parameters:
        operationalTemplate - An input stream (such as a class path resource or a file) pointing to an .opt (Operational Template).
        pathValueMap - The map of web template paths mapped to their respective values, such as that generated from a FLAT JSON composition.
        Returns:
        A Composition generated from the map.
        Throws:
        CompositionConversionException - If an exception occurs for any reason during the conversion process.

      • toComposition

        Composition toComposition(Template template,
                          Map<String,Object> pathValueMap)
        Converts the specified map of web template path - value pairs into a Composition object.

        Equivalent to toComposition(InputStream, Map), except that it takes a Template object as an argument.

        The following context parameters are required and MUST be supplied in the pathValueMap:
        • ctx/language - The language to use to resolve the terminology strings against.
        • ctx/territory - The territory (country).
        • ctx/composer_name - The name of the composer of the composition.

        Additional context parameters are also supported.

        Parameters:
        template - The org.openehr.jaxb.am.Template representation of an .opt (Operational Template).
        pathValueMap - The map of web template paths mapped to their respective values, such as that generated from a FLAT JSON composition.
        Returns:
        A Composition generated from the map.
        Throws:
        CompositionConversionException - If an exception occurs for any reason during the conversion process.

      • fromComposition

        Map<String,Object> fromComposition(InputStream operationalTemplate,
                                   Composition composition)
        Converts the specified Composition to a map of web template path - value pairs.
        Parameters:
        operationalTemplate - An input stream (such as a class path resource or a file) pointing to an .opt (Operational Template).
        composition - The Composition to convert to a map of values.
        Returns:
        A Map of web template path - value pairs, suitable for conversion into a FLAT JSON composition format.
        Throws:
        CompositionConversionException - If an exception occurs for any reason during the conversion process.

      • fromComposition

        Map<String,Object> fromComposition(Template template,
                                   Composition composition)
        Converts the specified Composition to a map of web template path - value pairs.

        Equivalent to fromComposition(InputStream, Composition), except that it takes a Template object as an argument.

        Parameters:
        template - The org.openehr.jaxb.am.Template representation of an .opt (Operational Template).
        composition - The Composition to convert to a map of values.
        Returns:
        A Map of web template path - value pairs, suitable for conversion into a FLAT JSON composition format.
        Throws:
        CompositionConversionException - If an exception occurs for any reason during the conversion process.
